title._content: Image taken from page 8 of 'Joys and Sorrows: where to find, and how to exchange them: comprising Agnes; or, a Word for woman ... and other poems. By the authoress of “Amy of the Peak” [Jane M. Bingham]. [With a frontispiece designed by the authoress.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Joys and Sorrows: where to find, and how to exchange them: comprising Agnes; or, a Word for woman ... and other poems.
